## Connect to NHL Data

```{r Read_In}
library(httr)
library(jsonlite)

base <- "https://records.nhl.com/site/api"
endpoint <- "/franchise"
call1 <- paste0(base, endpoint)

get_franchise <- GET(call1)
get_franchise_text <- content(get_franchise, "text")

get_franchise_text
```
